topic.title: Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise - Introduction
topic.shortdesc: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise add-on enhances technical documentation with advanced AI support, tailored to company-specific AI services like OpenAI, Microsoft Azure OpenAI, and Anthropic Claude. Installation involves selecting the add-on from the Oxygen XML Editor's add-on dialog and configuring it with an Enterprise license. This add-on is free with an Enterprise license, but a special license key or subscription is required otherwise.

body.p: The Oxygen AI Positron Assistant Enterprise add-on provides advanced AI-support for technical documentation writers throughout their content creation process by using a company-specific AI service, by configuring the company's specific connection: OpenAI, Microsoft Azure OpenAI, Anthropic Claude.
A detailed list of actions and functionality available in the add-on is presented in the topic.
